content: **calida mittens** ======================================= the calida mittens are oh so warm and cozy and absolutely perfect for keeping little and large hands toasty during the winter i absolutely adore the texture in these mitts thanks to the front post and back post stitches **mitten sizing & fit** this mittens pattern is written for a whopping 8 sizes from baby up to adult xl so it s absolutely perfect for handmade gift making size / to fit hand circumference baby 5 5 / 14cm toddler 5 5 / 14cm child 6 / 15cm tween 6 5 / 16 5cm s 7 / 17 5cm m 7 5 / 19cm l 8 / 20cm xl 8 5 / 21 5cm **yarn** for this pattern you will need any #3/dk/light weight yarn in one or more colors i used wecrochet alpaca cloud dk 1 and i did both a solid and a striped version so you can experiment as much as you like approx yarn requirements per pair baby 105 yds / 96m toddler 145 yds / 133m child 180 yds / 165m tween 205 yds / 187m s 265 yds / 242m m 300 yds / 274m l 325 yds / 297m xl 360 yds / 329m **hooks** i used two different hook sizes for the ribbed cuff i used a 3 5mm e-4 crochet hook 2 and for the main body of the mitten i used a 4 5mm us 7 crochet hook 3 you can use any hooks that allow you to meet the gauge listed in the pattern **pattern support** as with all my patterns i am more than happy to offer any help and support that i can -
